Package com.fdm.model

Class ActorFactory

java.lang.Object
com.fdm.model.ActorFactory
public class ActorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
A factory for generating subclasses of Actor Applies the Factory design pattern
Version:
1.0
Author:
KILA
